mapper.sql: SELECT `comment`.id,`comment`.themeId,`comment`.reply,`comment`.replyId, `comment`.replyTime, `user`.`name` as userName, `user`.sex,`user`.age,`user`.icon, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM zan WHERE zan.targetId = `comment`.id AND zan.type = 1 ) AS zan FROM `comment` LEFT JOIN `user` on `comment`.replyId = `user`.id
